title: What Does GDC's Postponement Mean for E3? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.02.20
description:
Blessing and Greg talk about GDC's postponement, Valorant's reveal, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:04:06 - Housekeeping
TOMORROW’S THE BIG DAY: Boss Baby Barrett’s Zelda In Review Premieres at 2pm PT: https://youtu.be/SftdpUVXQLA 
The Roper Report   -
00:06:45 - GDC is Postponed!
00:25:43 - “What is going to happen that week is it gonna be a normal week or is something gonna happen its place?” - William Di Angelo
00:32:13 - Death Stranding PC Release Date, Half-Life Crossover
00:34:58 - Valorant Revealed
00:36:52 - “Do you think Riot's Valorant can have a break-out into the shooter scene like Apex did?” - Jeff from Philly
00:41:35 - Out today
00:43:13 -  “Ad”  
 Reader mail   -
00:44:14 - “More bad news for Nvidia this weekend…” - Jamie S
00:54:23 - “Yesterday Platinum said in an interview that the reason for The Wonderful 101's kickstarter was not for funding at all…” - Arvin
00:59:25 - Squad Up: Marty88 - Xbox - Reillyda86
01:00:55 - You‘re Wrong
01:03:44 - Post Show
This Week’s Hosts:
TUESDAY: Blessing and Imran
WEDNESDAY: Blessing and Whitta
THURSDAY: Blessing and Tim
FRIDAY: Blessing and Imran
